Title: The dark side of cloud computing: soaring carbon emissions
Snippet: Experts warn the electricity consumption and carbon footprint of cloud computing will more than double from 2007 levels by 2020.
Author: The Guardian

Title: Greenpeace Report: Clicking Clean
Snippet: The Internet needs a lot of energy, and its footprint grows every day as we live more and more of our lives online. Thatâ€™s why Greenpeace is calling on major Internet companies to lead the way in renewable power.
Author: Greenpeace
